text: Lyubov Ivanovna Dobrzhanskaya (; December 24, 1905, Kiev — November 3, 1980, Moscow) was a Soviet singer and actress of theater and cinema. She won the Stalin Prize II degree in 1951Любовь Ивановна Добржанская — Киносозвездие and the People's Artist of the USSR Award in 1965.Мировая мама из «Иронии судьбы». Актриса Любовь Добржанская потеряла в Киеве отца и мужа, но обрела призвание She is best known for her roles in films Beware of the Car (as Detochkin's mother) and The Irony of Fate (as Zhenya's mother). ==Biography== Dobrzhanskaya was born to a noble family on December 24, 1905 in Kiev. In 1923-1924 she studied at the theater studio. In 1934 she began acting in the Russian Army Theatre in Moscow where Aleksey Popov had a great influence on her art. She participated in various concerts. Her performances of romances enjoyed great success. She was also the author of Leonid Utyosov's song Under the Spring Foliage.ГТРК Культура: Острова She was married four times but had no children.Театральная Энциклопедия Lyubov Dobrzhanskaya died on November 3, 1980 in Moscow. She was buried at the Vagankovo Cemetery. ==References== ==External links== * * «Мировая мама» была киевлянкой!
